panels.description:
Average Maturity Level (All Capabalities)
Not Installed WIP Installed
-100% to -20% -20% to 60% 60% to 100%

targets.rawSql:
select 
 round(100.0*avg(answer_result)::decimal, 2) total
from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
where 1 = 1
and category_name not in('Feedback')
and capability_name not in('Feedback')
and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'

panels.description:
Maturity Level by Capability (Technical Capabilities)
Not Installed WIP Installed
-100% to -20% -20% to 60% 60% to 100%

targets.rawSql:
select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0*avg(answer_result)::decimal, 2) "Total"
from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
where 1 = 1
and category_name not in('Feedback')
and capability_name not in('Feedback')
and category_name = 'Technical Capabilities'
and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
group by capability_name
order by "Total"

panels.title: Measurement

options.content: Source: Last Capabilities Assessment. This Capabilities Assessment was strongly inspired by DORA Research

targets.rawSql:
select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0*avg(answer_result)::decimal, 2) "Current",
 (
	select
	 round(100.0*avg(pdac2.answer_result)::decimal, 2)
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac2
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name = 'Technical Capabilities'
	and pdac2.capability_name = pdac.capability_name
	and pdac2.assessment_date = (select max(assessment_date) from pod_devops_assessment pda where pda.assessment_date < '$assessmentMonth')
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
 ) "Previous"
from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
where 1 = 1
and capability_name not in('Feedback')
and category_name = 'Technical Capabilities'
and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
group by capability_name
order by "Current"

select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0*avg(answer_result)::decimal, 2) "Current",
 (
	select
	 round(100.0*avg(pdac2.answer_result)::decimal, 2)
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac2
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name = 'Process Capabilities'
	and pdac2.capability_name = pdac.capability_name
	and pdac2.assessment_date = (select max(assessment_date) from pod_devops_assessment pda where pda.assessment_date < '$assessmentMonth')
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
 ) "Previous"
from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
where 1 = 1
and capability_name not in('Feedback')
and category_name = 'Process Capabilities'
and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
group by capability_name
order by "Current"

select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0*avg(answer_result)::decimal, 2) "Current",
 (
	select
	 round(100.0*avg(pdac2.answer_result)::decimal, 2)
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac2
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name = 'Measurement Capabilities'
	and pdac2.capability_name = pdac.capability_name
	and pdac2.assessment_date = (select max(assessment_date) from pod_devops_assessment pda where pda.assessment_date < '$assessmentMonth')
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
 ) "Previous"
from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
where 1 = 1
and capability_name not in('Feedback')
and category_name = 'Measurement Capabilities'
and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
group by capability_name
order by "Current"

select
 case 
  when tw.time_working is null or tw.time_working = '' then 'Not Informed'
  else tw.time_working
 end time_working,
 round(100.0 * count(pdac.response_id) / 
  (select
    case 
     when count(pdac2.response_id) = 0 then null
     else count(pdac2.response_id)
    end
   from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac2
   where 1 = 1
   and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
   and answer_type = 'YS'
   and answer in('NA', 'N/A')
   and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
  )::decimal, 2)
from (
 select 'Less than 3 months' time_working
 union
 select 'Less than a year' time_working
 union
 select 'A year or more' time_working
 union
 select '' time_working
) tw
left join pod_devops_assessment pda
 on tw.time_working = pda.time_working 
left join pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
 on pda.response_id = pdac.response_id 
 and pdac.answer_type = 'YS'
 and pdac.answer = 'NA'
 and pdac.assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
 and (pdac.pod_id::text in ('$podId') or pdac.vs_id::text in('$vsId') or pdac.product_id::text in('$productId'))
group by
 tw.time_working
order by
 case
  when tw.time_working = 'Less than 3 months' then 0
  when tw.time_working = 'Less than a year' then 10
  when tw.time_working = 'A year or more' then 20
  else 99
 end

with total_ys as (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
  and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
  and category_name in('Technical Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
)
select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0 * total_na / total_ys::decimal, 2) total
from (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total_na,
	 (select total
	  from total_ys ys
	  where ys.capability_name = pdac.capability_name ) total_ys
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name in('Technical Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and answer in('NA', 'N/A')
	and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
) total
order by total desc

with total_ys as (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
  and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
  and category_name in('Process Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
)
select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0 * total_na / total_ys::decimal, 2) total
from (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total_na,
	 (select total
	  from total_ys ys
	  where ys.capability_name = pdac.capability_name ) total_ys
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name in('Process Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and answer in('NA', 'N/A')
	and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
) total
order by total desc

with total_ys as (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
  and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
  and category_name in('Measurement Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
)
select
 capability_name ,
 round(100.0 * total_na / total_ys::decimal, 2) total
from (
	select
	 capability_name ,
	 count(*) total_na,
	 (select total
	  from total_ys ys
	  where ys.capability_name = pdac.capability_name ) total_ys
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and category_name in('Measurement Capabilities')
	and capability_name not in('Feedback')
	and answer_type = 'YS'
	and answer in('NA', 'N/A')
	and assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and (pod_id::text in ('$podId') or vs_id::text in('$vsId') or product_id::text in('$productId'))
	group by
	 capability_name 
) total
order by total desc

select
 case 
  when tw.time_working is null or tw.time_working = '' then 'Not Informed'
  else tw.time_working
 end time_working,
 count(pda.response_id) "Total"
from (
 select 'Less than 3 months' time_working
 union
 select 'Less than a year' time_working
 union
 select 'A year or more' time_working
 union
 select '' time_working
) tw
left join pod_devops_assessment pda
 on tw.time_working = pda.time_working 
 and (pda.pod_id::text in ('$podId') or pda.vs_id::text in('$vsId') or pda.product_id::text in('$productId'))
 and pda.assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
where 1 = 1
group by tw.time_working
order by
 case
  when tw.time_working = 'Less than 3 months' then 0
  when tw.time_working = 'Less than a year' then 10
  when tw.time_working = 'A year or more' then 20
  else 99
 end

panels.description: Was it your first time answering this assessment

targets.rawSql:
select ans.answer, coalesce(pdac.total, 0) "Total"
from (
	select distinct answer 
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac 
	where question = 'Was it your first time answering this assessment'
	and answer is not null and answer <> '' and answer <> '0'
	union
	select 'Not Informed' answer
) ans
left join (
	select
	 case
	  when pdac.answer is null then 'Not Informed'
	  else pdac.answer
	 end answer, 
	 count(*) Total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and (pdac.pod_id::text in ('$podId') or pdac.vs_id::text in('$vsId') or pdac.product_id::text in('$productId'))
	and pdac.assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and pdac.question = 'Was it your first time answering this assessment'
	group by pdac.answer
) pdac
on ans.answer = pdac.answer

panels.title: Was it your first time answering this assessment

panels.description: I Have a Good Knowledge About DevOps

targets.rawSql:
select ans.answer, coalesce(pdac.total, 0) "Total"
from (
	select distinct answer 
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac 
	where question = 'I have a good knowledge about DevOps'
	and answer is not null and answer <> ''
	union
	select 'Not Informed' answer
) ans
left join (
	select
	 case
	  when pdac.answer is null then 'Not Informed'
	  else pdac.answer
	 end answer, 
	 count(*) Total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and (pdac.pod_id::text in ('$podId') or pdac.vs_id::text in('$vsId') or pdac.product_id::text in('$productId'))
	and pdac.assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and pdac.question = 'I have a good knowledge about DevOps'
	group by pdac.answer
) pdac
on ans.answer = pdac.answer 
order by
 case
  when ans.answer = 'Strongly disagree' then 10
  when ans.answer = 'Disagree' then 20
  when ans.answer = 'Neutral' then 30
  when ans.answer = 'Agree' then 40
  else 50
 end

panels.title: I Have a Good Knowledge About DevOps

panels.description: I Had No Difficulties Answering this Questionnaire

targets.rawSql:
select ans.answer, coalesce(pdac.total, 0) "Total"
from (
	select distinct answer 
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac 
	where question = 'I had no difficulties answering this questionnaire'
	and answer is not null and answer <> '' and answer <> '0'
	union
	select 'Not Informed' answer
) ans
left join (
	select
	 case
	  when pdac.answer is null then 'Not Informed'
	  else pdac.answer
	 end answer, 
	 count(*) Total
	from pod_devops_assessment_capabilities pdac
	where 1 = 1
	and (pdac.pod_id::text in ('$podId') or pdac.vs_id::text in('$vsId') or pdac.product_id::text in('$productId'))
	and pdac.assessment_date = '$assessmentMonth'
	and pdac.question = 'I had no difficulties answering this questionnaire'
	group by pdac.answer
) pdac
on ans.answer = pdac.answer 
order by
 case
  when ans.answer = 'Strongly disagree' then 10
  when ans.answer = 'Disagree' then 20
  when ans.answer = 'Neutral' then 30
  when ans.answer = 'Agree' then 40
  else 50
 end

panels.title: I Had No Difficulties Answering this Questionnaire

list.definition: select distinct to_char(assessment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from pod_devops_assessment pda order by to_char(assessment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc
list.label: Assessment Month
list.name: assessmentMonth
list.query: select distinct to_char(assessment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') from pod_devops_assessment pda order by to_char(assessment_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') desc
